modules.title: Edit Settings
modules.summary: Maintain rates, optimizer defaults, and planning controls used by downstream load generation.

steps.title: Open Settings Overview
steps.instruction: From the left navigation, open Settings and confirm you are on the Overview tab.

note.text: Use this view to confirm current defaults before editing.

steps.title: Update Optimizer Defaults
steps.instruction: Adjust trailer, capacity, flex, and geo settings, then click Save Defaults.

note.text: Only approved planners/admins should change global defaults.

steps.title: Update Rate Inputs
steps.instruction: Use Rate Matrix and global metrics controls to keep freight estimates accurate.

steps.title: Confirm Changes
steps.instruction: Verify updated values render in overview cards and downstream planning pages.

modules.title: Upload Orders
modules.summary: Import order CSV files, monitor processing progress, and resolve SKU mapping gaps.

steps.title: Open Data Intake Hub
steps.instruction: Go to Orders and locate the Data Intake Hub panel.

media.alt: Data Intake Hub in Orders page

steps.title: Upload CSV and Watch Progress
steps.instruction: Click Upload Orders, select a CSV file, and monitor the upload modal until completion.

steps.title: Resolve Unmapped SKU Items
steps.instruction: Review unmapped SKU cards, accept suggested dimensions, and approve entries.

note.text: Incorrect SKU dimensions can distort utilization and load quality.

steps.title: Review Upload Results
steps.instruction: Check recent import history, mapped percentage, and changed/reopened order counts.

modules.title: Review Orders
modules.summary: Filter, inspect, and validate orders before launching optimization.

steps.title: Set Filters and Scope
steps.instruction: Apply plant, due-date, state, and customer filters to focus on the right order pool.

media.alt: Orders filters and plant scope controls

steps.title: Select an Order Row
steps.instruction: Click an order row to load the expanded review pane.

steps.title: Inspect Line Items and Stack Data
steps.instruction: Review line-level quantities, stacking assumptions, and utilization signals.

media.alt: Expanded order details and stack panel

steps.title: Validate Destinations and Map Stops
steps.instruction: Confirm destination sequence and identify any warning indicators before optimization.

media.alt: Order destination map and stop validation

modules.title: Generate Draft Loads
modules.summary: Use the Session Config Workbench to generate draft loads from the current order pool.

steps.title: Open Session Config Workbench
steps.instruction: Click Generate Draft Loads to open optimization settings.

media.alt: Generate Draft Loads button and workbench panel

steps.title: Set Origin and Scope
steps.instruction: Select origin plant and optional state/customer filters for the run.

media.alt: Origin and scope controls in workbench

steps.title: Configure Scheduling Logic
steps.instruction: Set start date, batch horizon, and due-date flexibility based on dispatch needs.

steps.title: Run Optimization
steps.instruction: Submit Run Optimization and transition to the Loads review view.

modules.title: Approve / Reject / Rebuild Loads
modules.summary: Review draft loads, approve final loads, return orders to pool, and rebuild unapproved loads.

steps.title: Open Draft and Final Tabs
steps.instruction: Use Loads tabs to switch between draft review and finalized outputs.

media.alt: Draft vs final tab navigation on Loads page

steps.title: Inspect Selected Load
steps.instruction: Open a load and review schematic, manifest, map, utilization, and freight details.

steps.title: Approve or Return Orders
steps.instruction: Approve strong loads or return orders to pool with a required reason and detail.

media.caption: Example click-to-play approval and return workflow.

note.text: Returning orders requires a reason and at least 10 characters of details.

steps.title: Rebuild Unapproved Loads
steps.instruction: Use clear/rebuild actions to regenerate draft loads for remaining order pools.

note.text: Clear and rebuild actions can remove current draft composition.

modules.title: Access Load Report
modules.summary: Access completed-session reporting, export workbook output, and print report views.

steps.title: Complete Session Approval
steps.instruction: Ensure all session loads are approved so report actions become available.

media.alt: Completed session requirement before report access

steps.title: Open Load Report
steps.instruction: From completed load actions, open Load Report for the active session.

media.alt: Open load report action from loads page

steps.title: Export Excel Workbook
steps.instruction: Use Download Excel to export the structured load-session workbook.

media.alt: Download Excel button on load report page

steps.title: Print PDF View
steps.instruction: Use browser print action from the report page to generate PDF output.
